title: I don't have my banner loading screen [silver]
body: All my friends got there banners and I haven't gotten mine, There are silver 5's and I am Silver 4 and I don't have my banner. Is this a bug or this is like a waiting game.

replies.body: I have the same issue, if anyone knows the reason as to why I haven't received my banner nor my in game loading screen, please leave a comment on this thread. Thank you.
Have you bee banned anytime during the season?
